portal

Class Portal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ardor3d.scenegraph.Spatial
      • com.ardor3d.scenegraph.Node
        • portal.Portal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ardor3d.scenegraph.hint.Hintable, com.ardor3d.util.export.Savable

    public class Portal
extends com.ardor3d.scenegraph.Node
implements file.Savable
    The Portal class, by entering a portal, your velocity and angle of entry are conserved and you exit through the other portal, if it exists, see attached text files for more info
